function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Dependence on ai-algorithms for identification of suspected cases and high-risk groups may lead to misclassification or false negatives.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on ai-driven tools for accurate detection of covid-19 may lead to missed diagnoses and delayed treatment for individuals with other types of respiratory diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on smart city data network and terminal tracking systems may lead to privacy concerns and misuse of personal data.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential over-reliance on ai for disease diagnosis and patient positioning, leading to reduced human oversight and interaction","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on cross-population train/test-based ai models for virus detection","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Utilization of deep-learning prediction models for risk stratification in resource-limited settings","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contagious disease covid-19 propagation","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Literature search may have missed relevant articles due to specific search terms or exclusion criteria.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inaccurate data extraction and synthesis leading to incorrect conclusions and recommendations.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Language and communication barriers may lead to exclusion of valuable non-english articles that contain important insights.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Dependence on ai-driven tools for clinical, epidemiological, and public health data may lead to errors or biases in decision-making.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited use of ai in lmics may perpetuate health inequalities and increase the burden on healthcare systems in those countries.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for reliance on ai to overlook contextual and cultural factors in disease control and treatment, leading to suboptimal outcomes in certain communities.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure of existing health systems to prevent massive disruption caused by covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate processing and integration of clinical, epidemiological, and genetic data","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inability to optimize health care research in ongoing pandemics","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential lack of public and professional awareness of germicidal uv technology and its efficacy.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate training and certification of uv technicians.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of research on time-motion exposure to apply current uv exposure guidelines effectively.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Insufficient dosing due to ambiguous guidelines for uv fixture deployment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Far uv dosing not confined to the upper room","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Measles is a highly infectious respiratory virus believed to be predominantly airborne, increasing the risk of widespread transmission in built environments.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited pathogen reductions through air disinfection measures, such as uv, result in less than 1 log of risk reduction, which may be insufficient for effective control of airborne pathogens.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misinformation about the safety and efficacy of uv products","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of awareness and technical expertise for upper room germicidal uv implementation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of routine use of upper room germicidal uv in buildings where airborne infection is likely","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Underestimation of the necessity of air disinfection in a wider variety of public settings","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Blurred distinction between different pathways of respiratory infections","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Less transmission by large droplets and surfaces, and more by the airborne route","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Transmission of covid-19 and 2 deaths attributed primarily to airborne transmission","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of germicidal ultraviolet guv air disinfection leading to unchecked viral spread in the built environment.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty in understanding the transmission pathways of covid-19 leading to ineffective control measures.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential development of drug-resistant pathogens due to inadequate disinfection measures.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Provocations of right-wing parties calling for a ’return to normality’ and stopping npis","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overlooking the immediate health and well-being benefits of npis","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sustained decline in the incidence of respiratory diseases, including influenza and measles, but rebounding of rhinoviruses in children after the reopening of schools","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Significant reduction in aris and other infectious diseases during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Harmful collateral effects on health from non-pharmaceutical interventions npis","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Interrupted or delayed access to healthcare due to pandemic control measures","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decreased hospital admissions for non-covid related diseases","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Negative psycho-social effects of prolonged npis","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relaxation of state restrictions leading to increased covid-19 infections","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Under-reporting of cases and difficulties in getting tested","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Uncertainty in estimated infection cases due to sensitivity analysis","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited understanding of the transmission factor eta beta","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Low public
